violations.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
violations.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The banner landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one banner landmark

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.html: For at nettstedet skal fungere og være trygt, bruker Osloskolen informasjonskapsler. Noen er teknisk nødvendige, mens andre sikrer ulik funksjonalitet.
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Godtar du alle informasjonskapsler, tillater du også at vi samler inn data om statistikk og brukeradferd.
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:

violations.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
violations.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element should have focusable content
  Element should be focusable

violations.description: Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
violations.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has a tabindex greater than 0
